amendment.description: An amendment numbered 50 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to require the Secretary of Transportation to refine the reporting directives to provide more detailed information about the cause of a commercial passenger flight cancellation or delay, allowing greater transparency to the traveling public regarding the cause of a canceled or delayed flight.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires the Secretary of Transportation to refine the reporting directives to provide more detailed information about the cause of a commercial passenger flight cancellation or delay, allowing greater transparency to the traveling public regarding the cause of a canceled or delayed flight.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kean (NJ) amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 195 (Roll no. 350).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Kean (NJ).
